name: Eco-Emballages
membership: Packaging Chain Forum (Europen); EPR Club (ACR+); G7 (unformal WG with PROs of Germany, Austria, Portugal; Poland; England and Ireland); New Inno-Net; PET Core
goal:
Eco-Emballages pilots the national EPR scheme to collect and sort household packaging waste for recycling in France:

o It is a 100% private company, 100% committed to the general interest

o 67,1% of household packaging recycled in 2016, i.e. 3,2 million tons

o 50,000 participating companies (20,000 contracts)

o 36, 000 municipalities under contract (850 contracts)

o More than 7 billion euros invested over 20 years (1,9 billion euros from 2014 to 2016)

o 89% of household packaging waste managed within the French territory (10% in Europe; 1% overseas)

o 2,1 million tons of CO2 annually avoided; equivalent to 1M fewer cars circulating every year
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Internal Market
euInitiatives: Circular Economy Package and all Policy deriving from it, in particular regarding waste, packaging, plastics and ecodesign.
